about.heading: About Me
about.bio: I'm a full stack software engineer with a passion for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in modern web technologies and a strong foundation in computer science, I specialize in building scalable, user-centric applications. I thrive in collaborative environments and am constantly learning new technologies to stay at the forefront of software development.
highlights: 5+ years of experience in full stack web development
Expert in React, TypeScript, Node.js, and cloud platforms
Strong advocate for clean code, TDD, and agile methodologies
Published open-source contributor with 1000+ GitHub stars

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer

highlights: Reduced application load time by 60% through performance optimization

Mentored team of 5 junior developers, improving code quality by 40%
Implemented automated testing suite increasing code coverage to 85%
